title: Iraq
summary:
Citibank's presence in Iraq dates back to June 2013. Since establishing its representative office licensed by the Central Bank of Iraq, Citibank, N.A.has been  providing from offshore locations products & services to major corporations and financial institutions, as well as public sector entities. 

Citibank, N.A. Iraq has evolved into an active corporate citizen with a particular interest in supporting financial education, inclusive finance and capacity building through various initiatives locally.

Citibank, N.A. Iraq is regulated by the Central Bank of Iraq. Citibank, N.A. Iraq has one main Representative office located in Baghdad's Al-Jadriya District and has a total staff of 2 people.
tag-2: At Citibank, N.A. Iraq our mission is simple: We responsibly provide financial services that enable growth and economic progress.
